name: Shotzoom Software
tag_list: golfshot, golf-gps, golfplan, paul-azinger, mobile-software, software-development
overview:
Shotzoom is a mobile software development company focused on Active Lifestyles.

The company’s flagship product is Golfshot: Golf GPS, which is the leading golf application on the iPhone for 3 years. It provides GPS distances for over 39,000 golf courses worldwide while also providing scoring, statistics and sharing through the website www.golfshot.com.

In addition, the company created and developed Tiger Woods: My Swing; Golfplan with Paul Azinger, the #1 instruction app for golf on the iPhone; Golfscape, the #1 Augmented Reality app for sports; and Baseball Gameplan with Jason Giambi, the #1 instruction app for baseball on the iPhone.
